languages.text: "Два слова, Лорд-капитан, — подавление и страх. Подлая натура черни требует железной хватки, иначе их животное естество вырывается на волю. Для противодействия этому у нас немало отработанных и эффективных мер: внезапные ночные обыски, профилактические допросы, разнообразные телесные наказания и казни. Разумеется, законы корабля одинаковы и для офицеров — мы безжалостно искореняем гниль неповиновения повсюду".

"Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."
languages.original_text: "Два слова, Лорд-капитан, — подавление и страх. Подлая натура черни требует железной хватки, иначе их животное естество вырывается на волю. Для противодействия этому у нас немало отработанных и эффективных мер: внезапные ночные обыски, профилактические допросы, разнообразные телесные наказания и казни. Разумеется, законы корабля одинаковы и для офицеров — мы безжалостно искореняем гниль неповиновения повсюду".

traits.locale_text: "Two words, Lord Captain — suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they unleash their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship apply to the officers in equal measure. We ruthlessly eradicate the rot of insubordination wherever we find it."

languages.text: « Deux mots, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : répression et peur. Le bas peuple, de par sa nature, nécessite et même réclame une main de fer, sous peine de céder à ses pulsions animales. Nous disposons de nombreuses mesures éprouvées pour l'empêcher : fouilles nocturnes aléatoires, interrogatoires préventifs, châtiments corporels et exécutions. Bien entendu, les lois du vaisseau s'appliquent également aux officiers. Nous éradiquons sans pitié le chancre de l'insubordination, où qu'il se manifeste. »
languages.original_text: "Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."

Le bas peuple, de par sa nature, nécessite et même réclame une main de fer, sous peine de céder à ses pulsions animales. Nous disposons de nombreuses mesures éprouvées pour l'empêcher : fouilles nocturnes aléatoires, interrogatoires préventifs, châtiments corporels et exécutions. Bien entendu, les lois du vaisseau s'appliquent également aux officiers. Nous éradiquons sans pitié le chancre de l'insubordination, où qu'il se manifeste. »

languages.text: «Dos palabras, Lord Capitán: represión y miedo. Los instintos básicos de la turba piden a gritos una mano de hierro para evitar rendirse a sus ansias primitivas. Tenemos muchas medidas de prevención de eficacia probada: búsquedas nocturnas aleatorias, interrogatorios preventivos, castigos físicos y ejecuciones. Por supuesto, las leyes de la nave también se aplican a los oficiales. Erradicamos el cáncer de la insubordinación allá donde lo encontramos, sin piedad».
languages.original_text: "Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."

traits.locale_text: «Dos palabras, Lord Capitán: represión y miedo. Los instintos básicos de la turba piden a gritos una mano de hierro para evitar rendirse a sus ansias primitivas. Tenemos muchas medidas de prevención de eficacia probada: búsquedas nocturnas aleatorias, interrogatorios preventivos, castigos físicos y ejecuciones. Por supuesto, las leyes de la nave también se aplican a los oficiales. Erradicamos el cáncer de la insubordinación allá donde lo encontramos, sin piedad».

languages.text: “一靠镇压，二靠恐惧，舰长大人。那些乌合之众本性卑劣，我们采取铁腕统治，这样才能防止他们屈服于原始的兽性本能。我们会通过许多久经考验的措施来维持秩序，包括夜间随机抽查、预防性审讯、体罚、处刑等等。当然，船上的法律同样适用于军官。无论哪里产生了溃烂，我们都会毫不留情地将其根除。”
languages.original_text: "Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."

traits.locale_text: “一靠镇压，二靠恐惧，舰长大人。那些乌合之众本性卑劣，我们采取铁腕统治，这样才能防止他们屈服于原始的兽性本能。我们会通过许多久经考验的措施来维持秩序，包括夜间随机抽查、预防性审讯、体罚、处刑等等。当然，船上的法律同样适用于军官。无论哪里产生了溃烂，我们都会毫不留情地将其根除。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンに言いたいことは二つ、抑圧と恐怖です。暴徒の卑しい本性は、彼らが野性的衝動に屈しないよう、鉄の掌握を求めること。それを防ぐために、無作為の夜間捜査、予防的尋問、体罰、処刑など、多くの手段がある。もちろん、船内の法律は士官にも同様に適用される。私たちは、反抗的な態度を取るものには、容赦なく根絶やしにします」
languages.original_text: "Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンに言いたいことは二つ、抑圧と恐怖です。暴徒の卑しい本性は、彼らが野性的衝動に屈しないよう、鉄の掌握を求めること。それを防ぐために、無作為の夜間捜査、予防的尋問、体罰、処刑など、多くの手段がある。もちろん、船内の法律は士官にも同様に適用される。私たちは、反抗的な態度を取るものには、容赦なく根絶やしにします」

languages.text: "Zwei Worte, Lord Captain: Unterdrückung und Furcht. Die Urinstinkte des Pöbels schreien förmlich nach einer eisernen Hand, auf dass er nicht seinen animalischen Begierden nachgibt. Wir haben viele oft erprobte Maßnahmen, um das zu verhindern: Unangekündigte nächtliche Durchsuchen, präventive Verhöre, körperliche Züchtigung und Hinrichtungen. Natürlich gelten die Gesetze des Schiffes gleichermaßen auch für die Offiziere. Wir löschen das Geschwür der Ungehorsamkeit aus, wo wir es auch finden, ohne Gnade."
languages.original_text: "Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."

languages.text: "İki kelimeyle Lord Kaptan: Baskı ve korku. Ayaktakımının doğasında demir bir iradeye itaat etmek vardır, aksi hâlde hayvani dürtülerine teslim olurlar. Bunu önlemek konusunda birçok test edilmiş yöntemimiz vardır: Rastgele gece aramaları, önleyici sorgulamalar, bedensel cezalar ve idamlar. Elbette gemideki kurallar, subaylar için de eşit derecede geçerlidir. İtaatsizlik tohumlarını bulduğumuz an acımasızca yok ederiz."
languages.original_text: "Two words, Lord Captain: suppression and fear. The base nature of the rabble cries for an iron grip, lest they give in to their animal urges. We have many well-tested measures to prevent it: random night searches, preventive interrogations, corporal punishment, and executions. Of course, the laws of the ship equally apply to the officers. We eradicate the canker of insubordination wherever we find it, without mercy."
